This is a running tally of R7RS-small plebiscite votes received so far, with links to the actual votes.  This tally may contain errors, and is not yet a certified return.

To vote, see [[http://lists.scheme-reports.org/pipermail/scheme-reports/2013-April/003299.html|these instructions]].  Note that '''the voting period has been extended until the end of May 20''' in every time zone, which is the same as saying until noon on May 21, Coordinated Universal Time.
